Text.Page:
Someday, I'll make my own additions to this list...and then won't THEY be surprised. Heh.

Anyway! Enough about me, let's focus on you! You will be killing...let me see...{@LinkCreature:38#31#hungry ruins hyenas}, {@LinkCreature:38#38#prion destroyers}, and {@LinkCreature:38#37#prion bonecrushers}. Sounds like fun. Wish I could join you.

Go see Elmaire at Craterview Outpost in Sienna Canyon when you're through.

Good job. Here's your reward.

Keep up the good work!
